___mem.description: Memory to allocate to each OpenLDAP node.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each OpenLDAP node.

___ldap_port.description: The port where the DC/OS OpenLDAP instance is listening on. Defaults to 389.

___ldap_location.description: The name of the DC/OS OpenLDAP instance to connect to.

___external_access.description:
Enable access from outside the cluster through Marathon-LB.
NOTE: this connection is unencrypted.

___virtual_host.description: Virtual Host URL to be used in the external Marathon-LB load balancer.

___external_port.description: Port number to be used in the external Marathon-LB load balancer

___enable.description: Enable or disable creating a VIP for external access through a public node running Marathon-LB. Defaults to FALSE.
